name.ja: <ruby>秘<rt>ひ</rt></ruby><ruby>密<rt>みつ</rt></ruby><ruby>捜<rt>そう</rt></ruby><ruby>査<rt>さ</rt></ruby><ruby>官<rt>かん</rt></ruby>ミステイク

requirement.en: During your Main Phase this card was Normal or Special Summoned.

effect.en: Excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck. You can add 1 excavated Level 3 or higher Reptile Type monster to your hand. Place the remaining cards on the top of the Deck in any order.
